title: Welcome to the Panel System
heading: Introduction
content: This is a demonstration of the collapsible panel entry system. Click on any panel heading to expand or collapse the content. You can add, edit, and delete entries from the Admin page.

title: Sample Entry - Meeting Minutes
heading: Meeting Notes - January 2024
content: This panel demonstrates how meeting minutes or announcements can be displayed. The content can be as long as needed and will be displayed in a clean, organized format within the collapsible panel.

title: Important Announcement
heading: System Update Notice
content: This is an example of how important announcements can be posted. Users can click on the panel heading to view the full details of the announcement.
